00002  * File: RockFluid.h
00003  * -----------------
00004  * Header file for rockfluid model (krp ~ Sp, Pc ~ Sp) 
00005  * this is a base class, and subclasses are for 2-phase and 3-phase

00007  *              Created   03/29/99    Hui Cao
00008  *
00009  * 
00010  */

00014 #include <cassert>
00015 
00016 class RockFluid {
00017 public:
00018         RockFluid(FileIO &fio);
00019         virtual ~RockFluid();

00021         // --- table lookup to get the rela perm and capi pres ---

00023                                double *kr2, double *dkr2_ds,
00024                                                  double *pc, double *dpc_ds) { assert(false); };                // two phase version

00052         //find end point saturations and perms. from input table

00054                 double &sc1,double &kr1c, double &pc1c, double &sc2, double &kr2c, double &pc2c);
